original_text: and he said to his servants, “This is John the Baptist. He has been raised from the dead; that is why these miraculous powers are at work in him.”
korean_text: 그 신하들에게 이르되 이는 세례 요한이라 그가 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났으니 그러므로 이런 능력이 그 속에서 역사하는도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: and he said to his servants,
He has been raised from the dead;
that is why these miraculous powers are at work in him.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 이런 기적의 능력이 그에게서 나타나는 것이다.”
